Nov. 19, 2017 D Leicestershire BBA (Leicester) Contest (Second Section)
Leicestershire BBA (Leicester) Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Leicestershire Brass Band Association (Leicester) Contest leicester-contest-second-section
Eadon Hall, Fairfield Preparatory School, Loughborough Endowed Schools, Loughborough, Leicestershire, England, UK Best Instrumentalist: Euphonium, Crofton
Shadow adjudicator: Philip Judge
Sept. 9, 2017, 8:30 p.m. Nov. 26, 2017, 3:08 p.m.
1 Crofton Silver Band Dean Jones Fire In The Blood
2 Flixton Band Ian Brownbill Music of a Legacy
